Source code for Playground.my_utils.classTools_.class_Tree

[docs]def class_tree(cls, indent):
    print("." * indent, cls.__name__)
    for supercls in cls.__bases__:
        class_tree(supercls, indent + 3)




[docs]def instance_tree(inst):
    print("Tree", inst)
    class_tree(inst.__class__, 3)




[docs]def self_test():
    class A: pass

    class B(A): pass

    class C(A): pass

    class D(B, C): pass

    class E: pass

    class F(D, E): pass

    instance_tree(B())
    instance_tree(F())



if __name__ == '__main__':
    self_test()
